#### The published [paper](https://journals.plos.org/plosone/article?id=10.1371/journal.pone.0171591) is available on-line. The R package used to calculate the Protection Equality metric can be found [here](https://github.com/AChauvenet/ProtectEqual).

To install the package use devtools::install_github("AChauvenet/ProtectEqual")
